an4.258:1.1: “Yani kanici, bhikkhave, kulani bhogesu mahattam pattani na ciratthitikani bhavanti, sabbani tani catuhi thanehi, etesam va annatarena.
an4.258:1.3: Nattham na gavesanti, jinnam na patisankharonti, aparimitapanabhojana honti, dussilam itthim va purisam va adhipacce thapenti.
an4.258:1.4: Yani kanici, bhikkhave, kulani bhogesu mahattam pattani na ciratthitikani bhavanti, sabbani tani imehi catuhi thanehi, etesam va annatarena.
an4.258:2.1: Yani kanici, bhikkhave, kulani bhogesu mahattam pattani ciratthitikani bhavanti, sabbani tani catuhi thanehi, etesam va annatarena.
an4.258:2.3: Nattham gavesanti, jinnam patisankharonti, parimitapanabhojana honti, silavantam itthim va purisam va adhipacce thapenti.
an4.258:2.4: Yani kanici, bhikkhave, kulani bhogesu mahattam pattani ciratthitikani bhavanti, sabbani tani imehi catuhi thanehi, etesam va annatarena”ti.
